content: Over a year ago we released a series of docs , of which was is titled Modularity in Dataverse. I've been thinking we should add this to the guides under a title like "How to extend Dataverse" but our guides don't really have howto's. Any ideas on where to put it? Does it deserve its own guide? If so, what should we call it?

Maybe one level under the Developper Guide &/or the Installation Guide ? I'm not sure a separate guide would be best fitted for this and there are already 8 guides.
As for the title, I like the "Modularity in Dataverse part" maybe add "How to: " to it, "extend" sounds a bit intimidating but maybe that's just me :smiley:
Or maybe one level under the Admin Guide? :thinking:
I don't want to overthink it. :grinning: I just want the content to be out there. We could always reorganize later.
I think either under admin or dev works, I guess it depends on who the intended audience primarily is.

Yeah, maybe Installation Guide, right after Configuration:

  • Configuration
  • How to Extend Dataverse
  • Upgrading
Yeah, that makes sense to put it close to configuration, I think.

@Oliver Bertuch wrote some nice guidance about our plugin architecture (see #dev > plugins, SPI, compatibility and dependency hell ðŸ§¯ for a link). I'm thinking that at least some of that content belongs in the guides.
